div.p: It can be done, don’t feel that if you’ve left school with no GCSEs or any A-Levels or whatever well I know what they do but
don’t feel because you haven’t got that that you can’t achieve; as much as people are very focused on qualifications and Degrees
and Masters and Diplomas and stuff I think what I’ve got is life skills and I think that’s things you can’t read from a textbook...
